name: Keep On Track
description:
Keep On Track was created for Abertay University's DES310 Module for Modern Wolf.

Keep On Track is a 3D strategy game set in a post-apocalyptic world. You take control of a train transport hauling resources to a surviving settlement, traveling through multiple environments, each with its own look and atmosphere. During this journey, you will face a large array of choices to survive in the wasteland. Balance your resources or you will be left stranded.

Gameplay Video:

Supported Platforms: PC - Windows

The Team:

Zhoro Urumov - Production & Team Lead

Haohong Yan - Game Design & Mechanics

Aaron Crawford - Programming & Optimization

Eleanor Findlay - 2D Art

Lukasz Mocek & Rodrigo Braga - 3D Art

Jaromir Stifter - Animation

James Conroy - Audio Design & Implementation

Christos Michalakos - Academic Tutor

Modern Wolf - Client

Keep On Track was created for Abertay University's DES310 Module for Modern Wolf.
